name: Asteroid Shooter (Gioele-Bencivenga)
description:
A simple space shooter game I developed for a university module using HaxeFlixel.

WASD or arrow keys for movement, J or spacebar for shooting.

See how high of a score you can get.

Get the source code at https://github.com/Gioele-Bencivenga/FlixelGame

Credits:

Asteroid images by Cayden Franklin at https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-2d-asteroid-pack

Ship image by scofanogd at https://opengameart.org/content/spaceship-9

Laser and particles by Master484 at https://opengameart.org/content/bullet-collection-1-m484

Sound effects by SubspaceAudio at https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
